section.name: Default License
section.p: Most of the components included in this project are licensed under the Apache 2 license as described here.

Some components are included for convience of providing a comprehensive bundle rather than requiring end-users to assemble the components themselves. These components are subject to a separate license.

ul.li: The InstallAnywhere installer and associated libraries.
